page.title: 03Local Newspapers
page.content: There are 5 different local papers; they are:'Evening Leader', 'Express', 'Mail', 'Observer', and ' Chronicle'. Some have headlines like this "Dipping In For Charity", "Debate Plea", and "Play Dream Comes True". Some papers are just advertisments selling houses,cars and bric-a-brac. Other papers have a game called BINGO which involves a card with numbers on it, the papers publish numbers and you cross the numbers out on your card. Others have competitions which you can enter, obituary columns which list names of people who have died recently, and columns containing recent weddings. Some papers are daily, others weekly, some are free due to advertising revenue. All can be delivered to your door by PAPERBOYS/ GIRLS. {
